channel.itunes:subtitle: Latest news updates from HindustanTimes.com for ANALYSIS. For more updates hop on to HindustanTimes.com.

item.title: Warmth and achievements aside India and China remain cautious
item.description: Policymakers are grappling with the implications of Xis visit While some are underwhelmed others point to the achievements But all agree that border troubles dampened the mood
item.itunes:subtitle: Policymakers are grappling with the implications of Xis visit While some are underwhelmed others point to the achievements But all agree that border troubles dampened the mood
item.itunes:summary: Policymakers are grappling with the implications of Xis visit While some are underwhelmed others point to the achievements But all agree that border troubles dampened the mood

item.title: Narendra Modis defence of Muslims is expediently wise
item.description: Narendra Modis endorsement of Indian Muslims might have come a trifle late But its significance or expedience cannot be downplayed in the light of internal security imperatives dovetailed to his economic agenda
item.itunes:subtitle: Narendra Modis endorsement of Indian Muslims might have come a trifle late But its significance or expedience cannot be downplayed in the light of internal security imperatives dovetailed to his economic agenda
item.itunes:summary: Narendra Modis endorsement of Indian Muslims might have come a trifle late But its significance or expedience cannot be downplayed in the light of internal security imperatives dovetailed to his economic agenda

item.title: Tibetan confidence in India has increased but will Modi give in to China
item.description: As much as the Tibetans are dependent on India given that the Tibetan exile government is based herenbspit is also a fact that Tibet remains the missing link in the IndiaChina border dispute
item.itunes:subtitle: As much as the Tibetans are dependent on India given that the Tibetan exile government is based herenbspit is also a fact that Tibet remains the missing link in the IndiaChina border dispute
item.itunes:summary: As much as the Tibetans are dependent on India given that the Tibetan exile government is based herenbspit is also a fact that Tibet remains the missing link in the IndiaChina border dispute

item.title: Defensive India needs to take firmer stand against China
item.description: Indias fumbling responses to the increasing Chinese incursions do not bode well for its Himalayan security writes Brahma Chellaney
item.itunes:subtitle: Indias fumbling responses to the increasing Chinese incursions do not bode well for its Himalayan security writes Brahma Chellaney
item.itunes:summary: Indias fumbling responses to the increasing Chinese incursions do not bode well for its Himalayan security writes Brahma Chellaney

item.title: The PM must walk the talk on FDI
item.description: If Modi is serious about attracting more investment to the knowledgeintensive industries such as the biopharmaceutical sector his government will need to tackle three obstacles intellectual property rights regulatory system healthcare
item.itunes:subtitle: If Modi is serious about attracting more investment to the knowledgeintensive industries such as the biopharmaceutical sector his government will need to tackle three obstacles intellectual property rights regulatory system healthcare
item.itunes:summary: If Modi is serious about attracting more investment to the knowledgeintensive industries such as the biopharmaceutical sector his government will need to tackle three obstacles intellectual property rights regulatory system healthcare

item.title: Xi visit MoUs done now lets discuss health education
item.description: It is a welcome change to see Chinese President Xi Jinping meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ahmedabad as opposed to other heads of states who have avoided Gujarat China is an economic military and scientific powerhouse and to become one India needs to learn a lot from China
item.itunes:subtitle: It is a welcome change to see Chinese President Xi Jinping meet Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Ahmedabad as opposed to other heads of states who have avoided Gujarat China is an economic military and scientific powerhouse and to become one India needs to

item.title: For many undertrials its a long walk to freedom
item.description: In 2010 and 2011 the UPA released lakhs of undertrials as part of the National Mission for Delivery of Justice and Legal Reforms But for all the hoopla it failed to make more than a temporary dent in the countrys undertrial population

item.title: Moment of truth Floods expose the great divide in JK
item.description: Natural calamities are times of great truth of togetherness of closing ranks of forgetting hatred and bitterness Unfortunately the JK floods initially appeared to be enhancing the bitterness between Kashmiris and other Indians writes Samar Halarnkar
item.itunes:subtitle: Natural calamities are times of great truth of togetherness of closing ranks of forgetting hatred and bitterness Unfortunately the JK floods initially appeared to be enhancing the bitterness between Kashmiris and other Indians writes Samar Halarnkar
item.itunes:summary: Natural calamities are times of great truth of togetherness of closing ranks of forgetting hatred and bitterness Unfortunately the JK floods initially appeared to be enhancing the bitterness between Kashmiris and other Indians writes Samar Halarnkar

item.title: Why is India so mindful of protocols
item.description: Ever since Mumbai was besieged by Pakistani agents of terror in 2008 India has been consoling itself with lies Indias dogmatic adherence to uninterruptible dialogue with Pakistan has yielded only uninterrupted insults writes Kapil Komireddi
item.itunes:subtitle: Ever since Mumbai was besieged by Pakistani agents of terror in 2008 India has been consoling itself with lies Indias dogmatic adherence to uninterruptible dialogue with Pakistan has yielded only uninterrupted insults writes Kapil Komireddi
item.itunes:summary: Ever since Mumbai was besieged by Pakistani agents of terror in 2008 India has been consoling itself with lies Indias dogmatic adherence to uninterruptible dialogue with Pakistan has yielded only uninterrupted insults writes Kapil Komireddi

item.title: India should stay out of West Asia politics
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi would do well to distance India from the US exhortations on nonNato ally status writes Rajendra Abhyankar
item.itunes:subtitle: Prime Minister Narendra Modi would do well to distance India from the US exhortations on nonNato ally status writes Rajendra Abhyankar
item.itunes:summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi would do well to distance India from the US exhortations on nonNato ally status writes Rajendra Abhyankar

item.title: High costs may push the bullet train off track
item.description: Shinkansen or the Bullet train introduced 50 years ago in Japan has evolved into many avatars in Europe as TGV Train Grande Vitesse and China as CHR Chinese Highspeed Rail and is now poised to enter India in a big way
item.itunes:subtitle: Shinkansen or the Bullet train introduced 50 years ago in Japan has evolved into many avatars in Europe as TGV Train Grande Vitesse and China as CHR Chinese Highspeed Rail and is now poised to enter India in a big way

item.title: Modi and Xi need to balance interdependence and strategic rivalry
item.description: Both sides will first be straining to ensure thatnbspXi Jinpingsnbspvisit in no way pales in comparison to Prime Minister Narendra Modis recent visit to Japan Beijing has already announced that Xis visit will see investments worth 100 billion in India
item.itunes:subtitle: Both sides will first be straining to ensure thatnbspXi Jinpingsnbspvisit in no way pales in comparison to Prime Minister Narendra Modis recent visit to Japan Beijing has already announced that Xis visit will see investments worth 100 billion in India

item.title: Why did you toy with love jihad when sabkasaath sabkavikas worked fine
item.description: In three months time the BJP having successfully experimented with sabkasaath sabkavikas in Uttar Pradesh unofficially but inexplicably turned to love jihad in the bypolls As ModiModi chants got replaced with Yogiyogi cries in these bypolls the young who had just voted for their acche din got confused
item.itunes:subtitle: In three months time the BJP having successfully experimented with sabkasaath sabkavikas in Uttar Pradesh unofficially but inexplicably turned to love jihad in the bypolls As ModiModi chants got replaced with Yogiyogi cries in these bypolls the young who
item.itunes:summary: In three months time the BJP having successfully experimented with sabkasaath sabkavikas in Uttar Pradesh unofficially but inexplicably turned to love jihad in the bypolls As ModiModi chants got replaced with Yogiyogi cries in these bypolls the young who had just voted for their acche din got confused

item.title: BJP needs to think beyond Modi wave
item.description: The BJPs third straight drubbing in the byelections particularly in Uttar Pradesh after Uttarakhand and Bihar cannot be overinterpreted as a pointer to the national mood where the Narendra Modi phenomenon sustains broadly
item.itunes:subtitle: The BJPs third straight drubbing in the byelections particularly in Uttar Pradesh after Uttarakhand and Bihar cannot be overinterpreted as a pointer to the national mood where the Narendra Modi phenomenon sustains broadly
item.itunes:summary: The BJPs third straight drubbing in the byelections particularly in Uttar Pradesh after Uttarakhand and Bihar cannot be overinterpreted as a pointer to the national mood where the Narendra Modi phenomenon sustains broadly

item.title: Congress blazes through bypolls without its top guns
item.description: Tuesdays bypoll results perhaps show that the Congress can afford to be less dependent on its high command in poll campaigns if it can build a strong regional leadership
item.itunes:subtitle: Tuesdays bypoll results perhaps show that the Congress can afford to be less dependent on its high command in poll campaigns if it can build a strong regional leadership
item.itunes:summary: Tuesdays bypoll results perhaps show that the Congress can afford to be less dependent on its high command in poll campaigns if it can build a strong regional leadership
